column2: Choose one, or take 1d8 damage instead: Water becomes seemingly attracted to you causing you to get wet faster and stay wet longer when possible; Your hair seems to stay perpetually damp and hangs about your head; You begin to sweat at all times;
A container that you touch with a volume of less than 10 liters fills with water.
A container that you touch with a volume of less than 20 liters fills with water.
Up to 40 liters of water appears in an area that you can see in a shape that you designate.
Up to 80 liters of water appears in an area that you can see in a shape that you designate.
Up to 100 liters of water appears in an area that you can see in a shape that you designate.
Up to 200 liters of water appears in an area that you can see in a shape that you designate.
